trans-unit.source: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços para gerenciar a fila de itens de trabalho de um thread.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> mantém uma fila com prioridade de itens de trabalho para um segmento específico.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on a thread, it becomes the only <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that can be associated with the thread, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shut down.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é criado em um thread, ele se torna o único <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que pode ser associada ao thread, mesmo se o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está desligado.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> for the current thread and a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not associated with the thread, a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se você tentar obter o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> para o thread atual e um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não está associado com o segmento, um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> será criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is also created when you create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> também é criado quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.

trans-unit.source: If you create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> em um thread em segundo plano, certifique-se de desligar o distribuidor antes de encerrar o thread.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shut down, it cannot be restarted.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> estiver desligado, ele não pode ser reiniciado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> can only be accessed by the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> só pode ser acessado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está associado.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associados a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: All of the methods on <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, with the exception of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, are free-threaded.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, com exceção de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, são free-thread.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> have thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> têm afinidade de thread.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> are free-threaded when they are frozen.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> são free-thread quando eles estiverem congelados.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a [Visão geral de objetos congeláveis](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como colocar uma operação em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).
trans-unit.target: Para o código-fonte completo deste exemplo, consulte [Single-Threaded Application com exemplo de cálculo de longa execução](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, é criado um delegado que não aceita argumentos.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: This call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> utiliza dois parâmetros: a prioridade, que é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>e o retorno de chamada, que é passado por meio de uma instância do delegado `NextPrimeDelegate`.

trans-unit.source: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado de forma assíncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> Retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> objeto que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado quando o representante de eventos é fila.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> objeto retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> pode ser usado de várias maneiras para interagir com o delegado especificado, tais como:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se vários <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> as chamadas são feitas no mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, elas serão executadas na ordem em que as chamadas feitas.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O delegado para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados em <c>args</c>, que é enviado por push fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments on the thread that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> was created on.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado de maneira assíncrona com os argumentos especificados no thread em que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, retornado imediatamente após <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> ser chamado, que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado enquanto ele aguarda a execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> objeto retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> pode ser usado de várias maneiras para interagir com o delegado especificado, tais como:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes no arguments, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O delegado para um método que não usa argumentos, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como colocar uma operação em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: For the full source code of this example, see [Single-Threaded Application with Long-Running Calculation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).
trans-unit.target: Para o código-fonte completo deste exemplo, consulte [Single-Threaded Application com exemplo de cálculo de longa execução](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160038).

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts no arguments.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, é criado um delegado que não aceita argumentos.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Because every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> has a property that returns the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with, the desired <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is obtained by querying the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, in this case a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> named `startStopButton`.
trans-unit.target: Porque cada <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> tem uma propriedade que retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está associado com o desejado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é obtido por meio de consulta a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, nesse caso um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> chamado `startStopButton`.

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> takes two parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `NextPrimeDelegate`.
trans-unit.target: A chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%29> utiliza dois parâmetros: a prioridade, que é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>e o retorno de chamada, que é passado por meio de uma instância do delegado `NextPrimeDelegate`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O delegado para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados em <c>args</c>, que é enviado por push fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments, at the specified priority, on the thread that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> was created on.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado assincronamente com os argumentos especificados, na prioridade especificada, no thread no qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, retornado imediatamente após <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> ser chamado, que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado enquanto ele aguarda a execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> objeto retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> pode ser usado de várias maneiras para interagir com o delegado especificado, tais como:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes one argument, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado para um método que usa um argumento, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to pass as an argument to the specified method.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser passado como um argumento para o método especificado.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously at the specified priority and with the specified argument on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado de forma assíncrona na prioridade especificada e com o argumento especificado no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, retornado imediatamente após <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> ser chamado, que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado enquanto ele aguarda a execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: `Arg` can be `null` if no arguments are needed.
trans-unit.target: `Arg` pode ser `null` se nenhum argumento é necessário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> Retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> objeto que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado quando o representante de eventos é fila.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as:

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Alterando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.target: Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se vários <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> as chamadas são feitas no mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, elas serão executadas na ordem em que as chamadas feitas.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to place an operation onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como colocar uma operação em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: First, a delegate is created that accepts one argument, in this case a string.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, é criado um delegado que aceita um argumento, neste caso, uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> is called.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Because every <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> has a property that returns the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> it is associated with, the desired <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is obtained by querying the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, in this case a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> named `tomorrowsWeather`.
trans-unit.target: Porque cada <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> tem uma propriedade que retorna o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está associado com o desejado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é obtido por meio de consulta a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>, nesse caso um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> chamado `tomorrowsWeather`.

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> takes three parameters: the priority, which is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>; the callback, which is passed in through an instance of the delegate `OneArgDelegate`; and a string named `weather`, which is the argument for the callback.
trans-unit.target: A chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Object%29> usa três parâmetros: a prioridade, que é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal?displayProperty=nameWithType>; o retorno de chamada, que é passado por meio de uma instância do delegado `OneArgDelegate`; e uma cadeia de caracteres chamado `weather`, que é o argumento para o retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to pass as an argument to the specified method.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> is not a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> não é uma prioridade válida.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to begin shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade no qual começar a desligar o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Initiates shutdown of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o desligamento do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvokeShutdown%2A> demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvokeShutdown%2A> demandas irrestrito permissões de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> começa a desligar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não desligar completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: for shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: para desligar o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread is the thread associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o thread de chamada é o thread associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the calling thread is the thread associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o thread de chamada é o thread associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is created on may access the object.
trans-unit.target: Somente o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> que um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> é criado na pode acessar o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> to access the object from a different thread.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> para acessar o objeto de um thread diferente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> pode ser chamado de qualquer thread.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean indicating whether the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> é <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> retorna um valor booleano que indica se o thread de chamada tem acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> para determinar se um thread tem acesso a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is called to verify access to the thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> método no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associados a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é chamado para verificar o acesso ao segmento.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is updated by accessing the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>; otherwise, a delegate, which accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as an argument, is placed onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Se o thread de chamada tiver acesso ao <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é atualizado, acessando os membros do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>; caso contrário, um delegado, que aceita um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> como um argumento é colocada no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will delegate the work of updating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> delega o trabalho de atualização de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> for the thread currently executing and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> if one is not already associated with the thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> para o thread em execução no momento e cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> se um não estiver associado ao thread.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher associado ao thread atual.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not associated with the current thread, a new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não está associado com o segmento atual, um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> será criado.

trans-unit.source: This is not the case with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Não é esse o caso do método <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> will return `null` if there is not a dispatcher associated with the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> retornará `null` se não houver um dispatcher associado ao segmento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Disables processing of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita o processamento da fila de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura usada para habilitar novamente o processamento do dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy.
trans-unit.target: Desabilitar o processamento do dispatcher é um método avançado que é destinado para eliminar a chance de reentrância não relacionada.

trans-unit.source: The effects of disabling processing are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Os efeitos de desabilitar o processamento são da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: CLR locks will not pump messages internally.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueios CLR não serão bomba mensagens internamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objects are not allowed to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objetos não podem ser enviados por push.

trans-unit.source: Message processing is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Processamento de mensagem não é permitido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure that <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> estrutura que <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> retorna quando ele é chamado pode ser usada para reabilitar o processamento do dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure re-enables processing.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> estrutura habilita novamente o processamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> can only be called on the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> só pode ser chamado no thread de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to disable dispatcher processing and re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como o processamento do dispatcher de desabilitar e reabilitar o processamento do dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> is called in a **using** statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> é chamado em um **usando** instrução.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure that is used as the object to be disposed when the **using** block finishes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A> Retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> estrutura que é usada como o objeto a ser descartado quando o **usando** bloquear for concluída.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure, dispatcher processing is re-enabled.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> é chamado de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> estrutura, o processamento do dispatcher é habilitado novamente.

trans-unit.source: Requests that all frames exit, including nested frames.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que todos os quadros saiam, incluindo quadros aninhados.

trans-unit.source: for calling this method.
trans-unit.target: para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The thread to obtain the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> from.
trans-unit.target: O thread do qual obter o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> for the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> para o thread especificado.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher for <paramref name="thread" />.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher do <paramref name="thread" />.

trans-unit.source: If a dispatcher is not available for the specified thread, `null` will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se um distribuidor não está disponível para o segmento especificado, `null` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> does not create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on a thread that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> não cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> em um thread que não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on a thread that does not already have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> when attempting to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é criado em um thread que ainda não tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> ao tentar obter o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> has finished shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> terminou de desligar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the dispatcher has finished shutting down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o dispatcher concluiu a desligar; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> começa a desligar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está desligando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> has started shutting down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> iniciou sendo inativo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> começa a desligar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não desligar completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of hooks that provide additional event information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de ganchos que fornecem informações adicionais do evento sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The hooks associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Os ganchos associados a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks> class provides additional event information about the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, such as when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is inactive or when an operation has competed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks> classe fornece informações de evento adicionais sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, como quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> está inativo ou quando uma operação ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: for getting this property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é uma operação síncrona; Portanto, controle não retornará para o objeto de chamada até que depois retorna o retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The following example places a delegate onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir coloca um delegado para um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> usando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado a ser invocado pelo dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Action" /> especificado de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado a ser invocado pelo dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The priority that determines in what order the specified callback is invoked relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade que determina em qual ordem o retorno de chamada especificado é invocado em relação a outras operações pendentes no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa a <see cref="T:System.Action" /> especificada de forma síncrona na prioridade especificada no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O delegado para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados em <c>args</c>, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado com os argumentos de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do delegado que está sendo invocado ou <see langword="null" />, se o delegado não tiver um valor retornado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é uma operação síncrona; Portanto, controle não retornará para o objeto de chamada até que depois retorna o retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes no arguments, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado para um método que não usa argumentos, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate synchronously at the specified priority on the thread on which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado de forma síncrona na prioridade especificada no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do delegado que está sendo invocado ou <see langword="null" />, se o delegado não tiver um valor retornado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The following example places a delegate onto a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> using <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir coloca um delegado para um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Normal> usando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Inactive" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> é igual a <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Inactive" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> não é uma prioridade válida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="method" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="method" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to invoke through the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado a ser invocado pelo dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: The priority that determines in what order the specified callback is invoked relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade que determina em qual ordem o retorno de chamada especificado é invocado em relação a outras operações pendentes no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that indicates whether to cancel the action.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que indica se a ação deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified <see cref="T:System.Action" /> synchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa a <see cref="T:System.Action" /> especificada de forma síncrona na prioridade especificada no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in <c>args</c>, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O delegado para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados em <c>args</c>, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of time to wait for the operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: O tempo máximo de espera para a operação ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate within the designated time span at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado no período designado na prioridade especificada com os argumentos especificados de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do delegado que está sendo invocado ou <see langword="null" />, se o delegado não tiver um valor retornado.
