trans-unit.target: O tempo máximo de espera para a operação ser concluída.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate within the designated time span at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado no período designado na prioridade especificada com os argumentos especificados de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do delegado que está sendo invocado ou <see langword="null" />, se o delegado não tiver um valor retornado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> pode acessar esse objeto.

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associado ao thread de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> no local especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is a synchronous operation; therefore, control will not return to the calling object until after the callback returns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> é uma operação síncrona; Portanto, controle não retornará para o objeto de chamada até que depois retorna o retorno de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade em que o método especificado é invocado, com relação às outras operações pendentes na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: A delegate to a method that takes multiple arguments, which is pushed onto the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um delegado de um método que usa vários argumentos, que é enviado por push para a fila de eventos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: An object to pass as an argument to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser passado como um argumento para o método fornecido.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos a serem passados como argumentos para o método em questão.

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado na prioridade especificada com os argumentos especificados de forma síncrona no thread ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The return value from the delegate being invoked or <see langword="null" /> if the delegate has no return value.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado do delegado que está sendo invocado ou <see langword="null" />, se o delegado não tiver um valor retornado.

trans-unit.source: `Arg` can be `null` if an argument is not needed
trans-unit.target: `Arg` pode ser `null` se um argumento não for necessária.

trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Action" /> especificado de forma assíncrona na prioridade especificada no thread ao qual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the shutdown process of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de desligamento do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> sincronicamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown%2A> demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.InvokeShutdown%2A> demandas irrestrito permissões de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> começa a desligar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não desligar completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: for shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: para desligar o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The frame for the dispatcher to process.
trans-unit.target: O quadro para o dispatcher processar.

trans-unit.source: Enters an execute loop.
trans-unit.target: Insere um loop de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> represents a loop that processes pending work items.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> representa um loop que processa os itens de trabalho pendentes.

trans-unit.source: The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: O Dispatcher processa a fila de itens de trabalho em um loop.

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: O loop é conhecido como um quadro.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O loop inicial é iniciado normalmente pelo aplicativo chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame%2A> enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.PushFrame%2A> executa um loop representado pelo parâmetro `frame`.

trans-unit.source: At each iteration of the loop, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will check the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop.
trans-unit.target: Em cada iteração do loop, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> verificará o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> classe para determinar se o loop deve continuar ou se deve parar.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> allows for the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property to be set explicitly and it respects the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> permite que o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> respeita a propriedade a ser definida explicitamente e a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: This means when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, frames that use the default <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> começa a fechar, quadros que usam o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> implementação será fechado, que permite aninhados todos os quadros sair.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> para alcançar resultados semelhantes, como o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.DoEvents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="frame" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="frame" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished" /> is <see langword="true" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished" /> é <see langword="true" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="frame" /> is running on a different <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="frame" /> está em execução em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> diferente.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: Dispatcher processing has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: Processamento do Dispatcher foi desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: for pushing an execution frame.
trans-unit.target: para enviar um quadro de execução.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Pushes the main execution frame on the event queue of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Envia o quadro principal de execução na fila de eventos do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> processes the event queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> processa a fila de eventos em um loop.

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: O loop é conhecido como um quadro.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O loop inicial é iniciado normalmente pelo aplicativo chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The main execution frame will continue until the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shutdown.
trans-unit.target: O quadro de execução principal continuará até que o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é desligado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> finishes shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> conclui o desligamento.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processo de desligamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é iniciado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> begins to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> inicia o desligamento.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processo de desligamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é iniciado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> é definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the thread this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o thread ao qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The thread.
trans-unit.target: O thread.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção de thread é lançada e não capturada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> ou <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" />.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando uma exceção foi lançada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> é não detectadas.

trans-unit.source: A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador pode marcar a exceção tratados, que impedirá que o manipulador de exceção interna do que está sendo chamado.

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores de eventos para esse evento devem ser escritos com cuidado para evitar criar exceções secundárias e identificar os que ocorrem.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável para evitar a alocação de memória ou fazer qualquer recurso operações intensivas no manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento fornece um meio para não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> é gerado pela primeira vez e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> é definido como `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento não será gerado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> when in the filter stage.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção de thread é lançada e não capturada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke" /> ou <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke" /> quando no estágio de filtragem.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> and is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado durante o estágio de filtro para uma exceção gerada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> e não detectadas.

trans-unit.source: The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception).
trans-unit.target: A pilha de chamadas não é organizada neste momento (exceção de primeira chance).

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores de eventos para esse evento devem ser escritos com cuidado para evitar criar exceções secundárias e identificar os que ocorrem.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável para evitar a alocação de memória ou fazer qualquer recurso operações intensivas no manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> evento fornece um meio para não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> é gerado pela primeira vez e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> é definido como `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> evento não será gerado.

trans-unit.source: for adding or removing a handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um manipulador para este evento.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: Enumerações associadas: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The priority to check.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade a ser verificada.

trans-unit.source: A string that will be returned by the exception that occurs if the priority is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que será retornada pela exceção que ocorre se a prioridade é inválida.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> is a valid priority.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> especificado é uma prioridade válida.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="priority" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="priority" /> não é um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority" /> válido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o thread de chamada tem acesso a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Somente o thread de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> é criado na pode acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é público; Portanto, qualquer thread pode verificar se ele tem acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> é <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> retorna um valor booleano, se o thread de chamada não tem acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> lança uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> was created on.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> para determinar se um thread tem acesso para o thread que um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: The method takes an object as an argument, which is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: O método aceita um objeto como um argumento, que é convertido em um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is called to verify access to the thread.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é chamado para verificar o acesso ao segmento.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is updated by just accessing the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Se o thread de chamada tiver acesso ao <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> é atualizado, acessando apenas os membros do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread does not have access, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o thread de chamada não tem acesso, um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> é gerada.

trans-unit.source: This example catches the exception and pushes a delegate, which accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as an argument, onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo captura a exceção e envia um delegado, que aceita um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> como um argumento para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will do the work of updating the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> fará o trabalho de atualização de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.

trans-unit.source: The calling thread does not have access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: O thread de chamada não tem acesso a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto aguardável que transfere o controle de volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o dispatcher processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto aguardável que transfere o controle de volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o dispatcher processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: An awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto aguardável que transfere o controle de volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o dispatcher processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events.
trans-unit.target: Esse método fornece uma maneira para que você libere temporariamente o controle de execução para o dispatcher atual para que ele possa fazer outro trabalho, como processar outros eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Use o `await`, ou `Await` no Visual Basic, o operador em que o valor de retorno para retornar o controle para o dispatcher atual.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Use este método se quiser que seu aplicativo tenha a oportunidade de processar eventos enquanto o aplicativo está fazendo uma grande parte do trabalho no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar esse método em um loop de execução longa que atualiza um controle.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29> method and passing in <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente a chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29> método e passando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority.Background?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to schedule the continuation.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade na qual agendar a continuação.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto aguardável que transfere o controle de volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o dispatcher processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: The work that occurs when control returns to the code awaiting the result of this method is scheduled with the specified priority.
trans-unit.target: O trabalho que ocorre quando o controle retorna para o código aguardando o resultado deste método é agendado com a prioridade especificada.
